AppSettings.LoadDefaultDataHelp: Populate database with dummy data for example purposes. It will automatically be updated to false after running.
AppSettings.Secret: THIS IS USED TO SIGN AND VERIFY JWT TOKENS, REPLACE IT WITH YOUR OWN SECRET, IT CAN BE ANY STRING

UserDatabaseSettings.TimeoutHelp: Time to wait in milliseconds to see if connection can be made with MongoDB
UserDatabaseSettings.IntervalHelp: Time to wait in milliseconds to try establish connection to MongoDB
